borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-101&nbsp;R1 - Existing &amp; Proposed Block Plans - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-102&nbsp;R1 - Existing &amp; Proposed Floor Plans - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-103&nbsp;R1 - Existing &amp; Proposed Floor Plans - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-204&nbsp;R1 - Existing &amp; Proposed Elevations - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-205 R1 - Existing &amp; Proposed Elevations - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-306&nbsp;R1 - Existing &amp; Proposed Roof Plans - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">A-903 - Proposed Land Scaping - 24/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">Location Plan - 24/11/2022</span></span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a two-storey rear and side extension including a single storey front porch with relocation of the front entrance
